My group uses this skirt to some extent. Because it's so short, we alter it to fit. Count the flounces. There are four flounces, the original picture shows the last flounces twice the length going to the floor (maxi). On the actual skirt, the underskirt layer is four inches too short so one flounce is hidden under another and all flounces are the same length. The new picture with a model shows how short it is, tea-length, you can only see three of four flounces. Some people are shorter and some people like it short. PLEASE put the length back in and sell two lengths: regular and maxi. I'm sick of adding three inches to the underskirt. Good fabric, great construction, unfinished design. The longer last flounce is so far superior, but doesn't reflect actual product at all. Your mfg'r screwed it up.

Looks good on and comfortable.

I was worried this skirt wouldn’t fit, because of the size chart and the measurements. I wear a size 18-20 pants, my waist measurement is 48’ and this skirt fit me great! I’m 5’3 and the skirt barely touches the ground, so it might be shorter on a taller person.

评论概述: Should the ruffles be in the front or back?
评论详情: The ruffles go in the back. The label in the skirt should be in the back when you wear the skirt. The only reason that they show the ruffles in the front is because they want to display the ruffles. They should clarify the advertising of the photos and show front and back.

The skirt isn't the same color brown as shown in the picture. It's a much lighter brown. That aside, the skirt is GORGEOUS! And the material is comfortable. Is a bit heavy, but who cares! Overall, the quality of this skirt is still worth it

Love the quality and fit

I bought this for a theater costume and it turned out to be perfect for a Melodrama I was in. I didn’t wear a petticoat in my photo. It would have had more volume if I had worn one. 评论概述: They are making these cheap and thin
评论详情: These skirts used to be thicker, and with better quality fabric, it had an elastic instead if a zipper, I can see why they are $49 now instead of $200 like they used to be, I know this because I own two I bought 7yrs ago from this seller, I'm disapointed that they got cheap with the item, I should've gotten a large

This was perfect for my costume. The fabric felt surprisingly good, the front bustle works as intended, and the overall size and shape were great. The olive color is very deep and beautiful. Definitely a great quality skirt especially for the price. I got the small and it fits well, not tight at all but isn't about to fall off either (waist 28 hips 34). I'll be adding a petticoat under it, which is almost a shame considering how nice the fabric feels!

I am a large woman. I bought this with hope that the sizing was remotely accurate. I did a 2x and my women's 18 body fit nicely & easily with space to spare. What I liked about it is it's long enough that you could pull it up where you need to (If you're only five four like me I pulled it up to my rib cage) to make it shorter... or you can let it lay right above your hips so it's longer. I also like that the gathering for tufts on the outer layer can be gathered shorter or longer. Overall everything is sewn together very well. I don't recall the name of the brownish color that I purchased this in but it is far better than black because it's a lot more versatile. The brown is a very pretty tone. I dressed up for a Victorian float. I also purchased on here a non-hoop poofy slip skirt to go under it. The fabric is not pithy. It had no significance smell so I didn't have to wash it or dry clean it before using it. And while, like some people complain about the wrinkles it was wrinkly, I let it hang for a week before using it and I didn't care about the wrinkles. I sense this particular costume skirt will last me for the rest of my life whether I dress for summer at a reenactment, or Christmas time or if I am being an attendee at a Victorian funeral. I highly recommend it and have given the link to two other women who have also bought it.
It’s made of an odd fabric but it washed well (delicates/ hang dry). It looks GREAT and I got good wear out of it so far.

This skirt appears to be well made, however it's a bit short for how I was hoping to wear it. It hits about my ankles if I wear it at my waist and I am 5'7" about a 38in waist 48in hip. I was hoping for floor length but will layer it. It is also much more A-line than full. The gathering option is nice but there isn't much room for any significant bustle underneath.

I absolutely adore this skirt. Not only was it good for my Halloween costume but with it's style I can use it for renaissance fairs as well and potentially just as a casual fall outfit. It's stretchy around the waist and has strings if you want to tie it up in the front to get the long front out of the way when walking. I 11/10 recommend this but with all products, there might be a gamble for whether or not it's going to come in good or not so I'd suggest looking at more than just my review.

评论概述: Well made, fits great, easy to use.
评论详情: I love the style of this so much. Adjusting the ruffles was easy. The skirt is well made, color exactly what I was after. I wore a shirt crinoline skirt underneath because I did not have a long one to give it some volume. Size was perfect. I got a medium. I normally wear size 8. I'm 5ft 4in and about 135lbs.

Wife writing review: I used this skirt to create a Victorian Vampire look. It has lots of stretch, kept me decently warm, looked great and was functional. The tag was sewn into the skirt backwards, but that doesn't really affect its look or function. I'm 5'2, 120 lbs and I got a medium thinking that tucking a shirt in might require a little more room, but it was almost too loose. The skirt has a bit of weight to it, so since it was loose enough on my waist, I kept having to adjust it. I could have gotten a small for sure and still been comfortable. As a 5'2 female, this was not dragging on the ground when I wore it at my natural waist. I'm glad I got this skirt. It helped take my costume to the next level!

评论概述: Best victorian skirt you'll find on Amazon!

It came sinched already which was great. I did purchase a separate underskirt to fluff it out more, but it didn't really need it. 10/10 would buy again!
This skirt is worth every penny! I got it for my Victorian era costume and would definitely buy it again. It feels and looks high quality. I'm a size 20-22 in bottoms and purchased an XXL.

I was sort of surprised that the fabric feels silky, almost like taffeta, but quieter.  I don't know why, but I expected something cottony.  Anyway I like it very much.  It fits perfectly and does not require a petticoat
loved it for theme photos
It fits but not as the way I expected. Way too tight for me around the back side.
Made extremely well and of high quality.  Can't wait to put the complete outfit together for my event.  This will look stunning.
The product is exactly as advertised!

Waited until I wore it through multiple  events, and until I washed it to see how it held up....to write my review. It was exactly what I wanted! Shape was good, fabric was good, stitching was good, washed well, held up for long hours...I was totally happy with it! I'd definitely recommend it!
The skirt is not what is shown in the product photo. It’s a long plain fabric with three small ruffles at the bottom, completely scammed.

This skirt is beautiful, very well made and at a great price. Adjustable valencing ability is well done!  Using in my historical educator attire.  I wish it was made in more solid colors.  I would love to have this skirt in solid brown, khaki, green and navy!  You need to try on and pull your valence to ensure the underlining doesn't show and it runs a little large at the waist and hips for me with a mermaid crinoline.  A small, but full crinoline works better for this late Victorian style skirt.  Absolutely will buy again and refer others in my company to seek this skirt.

I absolutely love this skirt!!! I couldn’t believe the quality of it and how beautiful it was! It arrived earlier than expected too. The waist was stretchy and the strings easy to use. It didn’t feel to heavy but not cheap feeling either. This is definitely worth the money and I would recommend this skirt to anyone! The length was spot on too! It doesn’t drag and I’m so excited to show it off!
